Title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
Writer: John le Carré (novel), Bridget O'Connor (screenplay by), Peter Straughan (screenplay by)
Actors: Mark Strong, John Hurt, Zoltán Mucsi, Péter Kálloy Molnár
Plot: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 35 wins & 97 nominations.
Production: Working Title Films, Paradis Films, StudioCanal
